attributes.additional_details: We believe repealing this Act would support the heritage of country activities, including hunting with dogs.
attributes.background: We want the Government to repeal the Hunting Act 2004, which banned the hunting of wild mammals using dogs.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
